K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-0: @329b byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ye shes la mos pa ni dmigs pa thams cad la spobs pa 'byung zhing de ni tshig gi rab tu tha dad pa shes pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur te; tshul gcig la 'jug pa des thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-4: sgra thams cad bsnyad du med pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-7: mi snyan par smras pa la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-11: ri lhun po'i phung po la rlung bab pa las slar log na ri lhun po ni g-yo ba'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-12: rab tu g-yo ba'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-14: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de 'dra ba'i ye shes rtogs pas thams cad kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-17: rab tu g-yo bar mi byed cing pha rol mu stegs can gyi smra ba gang la'ang chags par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-19: mu stegs can gyi tshig kyang chos mnyam pa nyid du mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-20: mnyam pa nyid la'ang 'gal bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:329b-21: mu stegs can thams cad kyi spobs pa thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos su mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330a-0: zad pa'i chos kyis chos la nga rgyal chen por yang mi byed @330a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330a-1: de; skyes bu dam pa dag /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330a-8: bsod nams mi zad pa'i phyir sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330a-10: rtag pa las dben pa'i phyir des mtha' gnyis rtogs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330a-11: sems kyi sgom pa tshad med pa'i phyir des chos thams cad la brtag par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330a-12: chos yang dag par mi brjed pa'i phyir bdag gi dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa'ang yongs su gzhag par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330a-13: sems can thams cad la snyoms par chos 'chad pa'i phyir des snyems pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lhur byed pa'i phyir mi dge ba'i chos thams @330b cad dang mi 'grogs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-2: dran pa'i ye shes kyi go cha des ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-5: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i ye shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-6: de ni tshad yod pa'i spyod pas rtogs par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-7: de bas na bsam pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-8: thos pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-9: dad pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-10: sbyin pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-11: de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-15: shes rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-16: bsod nams ri rab lhun po bzhin du mngon par 'phags pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:330b-19: gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi gzugs kyi sems yongs su dag pas gzugs su snang ba yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang mig gis mthong zhing snang bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:331a-0: bdag gi rna ba'i sems yongs su dag pas sgra yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang rna bas thos @331a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:331a-6: rang gi sems yongs su dag pas yid dga' ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:331a-20: gang la spyod par bya zhes de chos nyid kyi rjes su 'jug par byed /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:331b-4: mgo yongs su gtong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:331b-7: bu mo yongs su gtong ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:331b-10: srog yongs su gtong bas dga' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:331b-11: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pas dga' ba ma yin gyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-4: gzugs la dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed; sems can thams cad mthong mod kyi sems can du 'du shes kyang mi skyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-5: las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir sha'i mig gsal bar gyur pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-6: mngon par shes pa thob pas lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas shes rab kyi mig rtogs par khong du chud pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgrub pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan la mos pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-9: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas chos kyi spyan snang ba thob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-11: de 'dra ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-12: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dmigs par gnas pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-13: byang chub ni thams cad dmigs pa ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-16: dmigs pa thams cad ni nang na'ang mi gnas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332a-19: byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la mi gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-4: byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lta ba yang dag par 'joms pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-6: bdag tu lta ba ni bdag tu lta ba las ldang zhing byung ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-7: bdud kyi las ni lta ba las ldang zhing byung ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-8: bdag tu lta ba yongs su shes na lta ba 'byung bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-9: lta ba yongs su shes na phung po 'byung bar mi byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-11: bdud kyi yul las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la reg par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-16: de bas na byang chub sems dpas las legs pa byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-17: las mi smad pa byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-19: las kha na ma tho ba med pa byed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-20: sems can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug pa rnams kyang mya ngan zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:332b-21: zug rngu dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir chos bshad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-0: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams @333a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-2: byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-4: skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-6: tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la'ang bag byed pa rten /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-8: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bag byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-9: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la brten pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-10: lha'i bu kun nas me tog gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-14: shing me tog gis brgyan pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i nye bar 'tsho ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-16: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi me tog rgyas pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i nye bar 'tsho ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-20: lha rnams kyi shing pa ri ya tra ka ko bi da ra me tog rgyas na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i du rnams mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333a-21: rigs kyi bu; de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi me tog rgyas na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333b-3: lha'i nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333b-5: byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa yongs su dag pa skyon thams cad dang bral la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333b-6: lha'i bu me tog 'od zer can gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333b-9: nyi ma'i 'od zer btang na mun pa bsal cing gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:333b-11: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi snang ba'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'ang gang gi tshe na chos kyi snang ba gtong ba de'i tshe /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-1: chos thams cad ni g-yo ba med cing byed pa med pa'i phyir glen pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-2: de dag la gdags pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-3: gdags pa med pa'i chos rnams ni shin tu ma skyes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-4: gang de ltar mos pa de dag ni grol bas mi snyems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-6: byang chub kyis mi snyems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-8: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di 'dra ba'i slob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-9: spyod pa bshad pa'i tshe mi 'jigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-12: de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-15: nam mkha'i dbyings ni mes mi 'jigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-24: nam mkha'i dbyings ni gzung du med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-25: rigs kyi bu; de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang chos thams cad kyis mi 'jigs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-27: sdug bsngal ba thams cad la mi bsam par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339a-28: byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus @339b so; ;sems can rnams kyi don byed nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa des de skad gsungs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-2: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i phung pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de gar gshegs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-7: gang nas gshegs par ro; ;smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-10: gang du gshegs pa nas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-13: sprul pa ni song ba'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-17: ji ltar sprul pa song ba'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-18: 'ong ba'ang med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de'i 'gros can nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-19: sems can thams cad kyang de'i 'gros can nyid do; ;smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-21: chos thams cad ji lta bu'i 'gros can lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-23: rang bzhin gnas pa'i 'gros can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-25: yang sems can thams cad ji lta bu'i 'gros can lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-27: las kyi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu'i 'gros can pa de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-30: 'o na chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa ma lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:339b-33: chos nyid la ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-0: chos thams cad ni chos nyid kyi rjes su 'jug @340a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-3: 'o na ji ltar na las kyi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu'i 'gros can pa de bzhin pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-5: las de ji lta ba rnam par smin pa'ang de bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-10: rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-13: de bzhin nyid ji lta bar las kyang de bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-14: rnam par smin pa'ang de bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-18: de bzhin nyid la ni las kyang ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-19: rnam par smin pa'ang ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-23: ji ltar de bzhin nyid la las kyang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-25: 'gro ba'ang med pa ltar las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'gro ba'ang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-26: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'gro ba ni 'ong ba med pa can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-27: 'gro ba med pa can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-28: de bzhin nyid kyi 'gros las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-29: bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-30: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340a-31: nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i spyan snga na bstan pa 'di la nyan to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces @340b gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-2: chos nyid ni gcig pa kho na lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-3: skyes bu dam pa skyes bu chen po de dag brjod pa sna tshogs kyis ston kyang chos nyid dang yang mi 'gal bar bgyid pa ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-5: su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-7: sh'a ri'i bu; byang chub sems dpa' dag ni de ltar ma chags pa'i slob pa la slob cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-8: mi chags bzhin du ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-10: sa bon ji lta ba bzhin bskyed kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-11: sh'a ri'i bu; de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi ye shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-12: de bzhin du de dag gi ston pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-14: khyod kyis bslab pa ji lta bu la bslabs pa khyod kyi ye shes kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-15: spobs pa'ang de dang 'dra bar khyod kyis thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-16: byang chub sems dpa' 'od bkod pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-18: nyan thos kyi bslab pa ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:340b-22: nyan thos kyi bslab pa ni tshad yod pa; byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni tshad med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-0: ji ltar nyan thos kyi bslab pa tshad yod la chags pa dang bcas pa de bzhin du de'i ye shes kyang tshad yod @341a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-1: la chags pa dang bcas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-3: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa tshad med la chags pa med pa de bzhin du de'i ye shes kyang tshad med la chags pa med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-6: 'khor 'di nas su'ang chos nyan pa mi spong bar bgyi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-7: skyes bu dam pa de dag 'dir mchi bar mtshan ma zhig mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-8: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-9: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni zab mo la mos pas de'i chos bshad pa'ang zab mo lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ong bar gyur pa 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-11: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyes bu dam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po de dag dang 'grogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-13: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-0: khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor nas byung la phyogs gcig tu song ste @341b chos sten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni mnyes par dka' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-4: gtam thams cad kyis mnyes par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-7: gtam ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-9: bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhyen te thugs su chud mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-10: bdag ji ltar spobs pa de bzhin du ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-12: gtam gang chos kyi dbyings dang yang mi 'gal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-13: de bzhin nyid dang yang mi 'gal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-14: yang dag pa'i mtha' dang yang mi 'gal ba de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-20: de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-21: gtam gang bdag la sgro mi 'dogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-24: chos ma yin pa la sgro mi 'dogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-26: mya ngan las 'da' ba la sgro mi 'dogs pa de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-28: zhes bya ba byin nas legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:341b-31: khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par bshad pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-1: bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-3: gtam gang spros pa thams cad las 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-4: ha cang yang mi zhib pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-5: ha cang yang mi rtsing pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-6: mtshan ma med pa'i gtam de brjod na ting nge 'dzin kyang mi gtong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-7: rtag tu shin tu sems mnyam par yang gzhog cing ston par byed la chos gang yang 'phel ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-8: 'bri bar yang mi mthong ba de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-9: ston pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-10: 'khor de nas lha'i bu sngon spyod pa dang ldan pas byang chub kyi sems rab tu stor ba nyis brgya 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de ltar tshad med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'ang de ltar shin tu bslab dka' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de tsam du bsgrub dka' ba yin na bdag cag gis slob pa 'di bslab mi nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-14: gang bdag cag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-15: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-0: kye ma'o lha'i bu 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @342b byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba'i skal pa yod do zhes lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'khor gyi phyi rol tu khyim bdag gcig mngon par sprul nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed kha zas ro brgyas gang ba zhig lag pa g-yas pa na thogs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-1: de nas khyim bdag de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-2: lhung bzed kha zas kyis bkang ba de bcom ldan 'das la phul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-4: bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du zhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes de skad gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed zas kyis bkang ba de bzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-6: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-7: bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-8: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-10: zhal zas 'di las bdag la ma stsal bar gsol na ni bcom ldan 'das byas pa gzo ba mi mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:342b-12: kye ma'o 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngon bcom ldan 'das la ji lta bu zhig tu phan btags na de'i phyir de byas pa gzo ba med pas rgol snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a @343a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-1: ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-4: khyod la bka' stsol gyis sdod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed des chen po'i nang du btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-6: btang ma thag tu 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-7: gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar lhung bzed de song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-8: de nas lhung bzed de 'og gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lhung bzed de ma bzung bar bar snang la 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la'ang bdag bdag gi bsnyen bkur byed pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das lhung bzed 'di ga las mchis zhes zhus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang steng gi phyogs kyi cha 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i drung @343b nas 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-1: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gdul ba'i phyir btang ba yin no zhes bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-3: sh'a ri'i bu; lhung bzed de phyungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-4: gang na 'dug pa ga la 'dug pa de'ang tshol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu la zhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-6: bdag gi shes rab kyi stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcur song yang lhung bzed de'i gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-9: gzhi'ang ma mthong nas de slar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-10: 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-12: bdag gis lhung bzed de'i gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-16: khyod kyis lhung bzed de tshol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu la zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-18: bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcur song yang lhung bzed de'i gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-20: de slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:343b-21: 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-5: khyod kyis lhung bzed de tshol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu gnyis la zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-7: bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu gnyis su song yang lhung bzed de ma mthong nas de slar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-8: 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-10: bdag gis lhung bzed de'i gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-12: de bzhin du nyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam bdag bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-13: lha'i mig gis lhung bzed de btsal kyang ma rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-16: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs par lung bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-17: lhung bzed de gang na 'dug ga la 'dug tshol cig ces de skad smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-1: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs par lung bstan mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-2: bdag gis ni ting nge 'dzin de dag gi ming yang ma 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin de dag la mnyam par yang gzhog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-6: bdag gis byang chub thob pa na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar gom pa 'dor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-7: ji ltar 'jog par mdzad ces gom pa gcig 'dor zhing 'jog pa'ang mi shes pa'i dus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-9: de bas na btsun pa rab 'byor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-10: 'jam dpal nyid la gsol cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-11: des ni lhung bzed de tshol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-15: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba ci nas kyang lhung bzed de phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dbul bar bsgor gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:344b-20: lhung bzed de gang na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-0: ga la 'dug pa'ang shes par gyis @345a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-2: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-3: gang bdag ni stan las kyang mi ldang zhing 'khor 'di nas mi snang bar yang ma gyur bar lhung bzed de dbyung ngo snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-4: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-5: 'og gi sa chen po la lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-6: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-7: gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-8: de dag tu lag pa de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal zhing song nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-9: lag pa de las bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa snyung ba ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-14: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsung ngo zhes zer ba'i sgra phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-15: de nas lag pa'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345a-16: 'od zer thams cad las me tog padma brgya stong byung zhing padma de thams cad kyi snying po dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag bzhugs par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag @345b thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i bsngags pa brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345b-1: lag pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345b-2: gang du 'gro ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad gdugs dang; rgyal mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345b-5: ba dang gyis kyang brgyan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345b-6: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa g-yas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad las 'das nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing snyung ba chung ngam zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang ba dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i zhabs la phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:345b-8: bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa snyung ba ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-0: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsung @346a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-2: lag pa de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-3: me tog padma brgya stong yang byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-4: 'od zer de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag dang yang ma 'dres par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de la bsnyen bkur byed pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-7: lag pa de las 'od zer bye ba brgya stong 'di dag kyang byung zhing me tog padma brgya stong byung bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-8: padma thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag bzhugs shing bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur ba'i lag pa 'di ltar blta na sdug pa 'di ltar dga' bar bgyid pa de su'i lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346a-12: steng gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-0: 'tsho gzhes @346b so; ;de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-1: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha ba gos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-4: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad thob pa zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des lhung bzed 'di blang ba'i phyir stan las ma langs bzhin du lag pa 'di btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su skom par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-8: bdag cag ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-10: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de blta bar 'tshal lo zhes de skad gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od byung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-12: 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad brtol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-13: thams cad yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-14: sems can gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog par gyur ba de dag thams cad ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:346b-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-0: slob pa gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog par @347a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-1: gyur ba de dag thams cad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-2: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin nyi ma lta bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-5: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-7: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dpal gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'di mthong nas du zhing mchi ma phyung ste 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-12: rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che bee d'urya 'dam du stsal bar gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed par skyes pa de dag la blta bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347a-17: khyod de skad ma zer cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347b-0: gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bskal pa bcur bsam gtan @347b la gnas shing spyod pa bas gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed par snga dro gcig sems can la byams pa'i sems bskyed na de bas 'di'i bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na dam pa'i chos srung ba de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347b-4: nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347b-5: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'od des reg par gyur pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347b-7: 'di ltar dga' zhing rab tu mgu bar bgyid pa nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong bar bgyid pa'i 'od zer 'di su'i lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347b-8: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347b-11: 'og gi phyogs kyi cha 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:347b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od btang ba @348a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348a-2: 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'di snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de blta bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong yod pa gnyis las 'od zer gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad las 'das shing brtol nas 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa de thams cad 'od zer de dag gis khyab par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i 'od zer 'og tu btang nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi lus la 'od zer des phog par gyur pa de thams cad ting nge 'dzin ri rab lhun po lta bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348a-11: dzambu'i gling 'di nas nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348a-12: zla ba snang ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-0: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin @348b gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-3: lha'i bu dag ri rab lhun po'i spyi bo la gnas shing dzambu'i gling du lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa de dag mthong bar gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-5: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa g-yas pa des de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa de nas nam mkha'i steng gi lam las lhung bzed de bzung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-6: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar te steng du phyung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-8: gang dag nas lag pa de phyung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-9: de dag tu 'od zer de dag nub par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-10: me tog padma de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-12: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa g-yas pa des lhung bzed de blangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'dir phyin par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:348b-13: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i spyan sngar lhung bzed de nam mkha' la 'phangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-1: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-3: lhung bzed blangs pa 'di lags kyi de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lhung bzed de bzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-6: bdag bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhig bcom ldan 'das la snyung ba ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-13: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsung ngo zhes de skad gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-14: sangs rgyas kyis gnang nas bdag bdag gi stan la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349a-18: nga la sngon 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gang phan btags pa de'i phyir nga byas pa mi gzo bas rgol bar gyur pa bshad kyi nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-0: sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang pha rol tu @349b gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi smod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi tshogs ni brgyad khri bzhi stong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-4: byang chub sems dpa' ni khri nyis stong du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de theg pa gsum po nyid las brtsams te chos 'chad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-6: theg pa gsum bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-7: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-8: thabs mkhas pa bshad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-10: yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-11: de nang par sham thabs bgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-13: lhung bzed khyer te bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyal po'i pho brang rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-14: de de nas zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i bza' ba mang po khyer te byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-15: yang de'i tshe na tshong dpon gyi bu dri ma med pa'i dpung pa zhes bya ba ma ma'i bang pa na 'dug par gyur pa las khye'u des dge slong de rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-16: mthong nas ma ma'i pang pa nas babs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:349b-17: dge slong de ga la ba der brgyugs nas bza' ba bslangs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-0: dge slong des de la mod ka @350a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-2: de bza' ba des brnyogs nas dge slong de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-3: de rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-4: de nas dge slong ye shes rgyal pos bsod snyoms ci rnyed pa khye'u de la byin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-6: bsod snyoms 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-7: de nas khye'u des bsod snyoms de blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-8: bcom ldan 'das de'i lhung bzed bkang yang bsod snyoms de yongs su zad par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-11: bsod snyoms gcig bu de las khye'u des nyan thos brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-12: byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-13: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan de zhos par byas shing bstabs kyang bsod snyoms de yongs su zad par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-14: de nas khye'u de dga' mgu rangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-15: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-16: yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste; tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-17: dge slong dge 'dun zhos byas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-18: lhung bzed nam yang ma zad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350a-19: sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-0: bdag gis nges @350b par mchod par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-1: 'jig rten mgon po zhos byas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-2: 'bras chan zad par ma gyur pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-3: sangs rgyas la ni phul gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-4: sbyin pa mi zad the tshom med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-5: ji ltar 'bras cha na mi zad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-7: sangs rgyas dag la gang gus pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-8: dge ba dag ni de bzhin 'phel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-11: khye'u des bsod snyoms gcig pu de las de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nyi ma bdun du zhos par gsol nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-12: khye'u de'i sems kyi bsam pa dad pas zas de yongs su zad par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-13: de nas dge slong ye shes rgyal bos khye'u de sangs rgyas la skyabs su btang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-15: dge 'dun la skyabs su btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-17: nyes pa'ang mthol du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-18: rjes su yi rang bar bya ba dag kyang rjes su yi rang bar byed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-19: gsol ba gdab par bya ba dag kyang gsol ba 'debs su bcug nas phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-23: ma khye'u de tshol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:350b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-0: de nas khye'u des pha ma de dag gi rkang pa la phyag btsal @351a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-1: nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-2: lus can kun la bde ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-3: bdag ni byang chub rab zhugs kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-4: khyed kyang legs par gnas bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-6: sangs rgyas sku ni 'bar ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-7: mtshan dag gis kyang brgyan la ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-8: ye shes kyis ni pha rol phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-9: byang chub de la su mi smos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dkon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-11: bdag ni khyim nas khyim med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-13: khyed cag gnyis kyis gnang bar mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-16: bdag cag gnyis ni khyod 'dod kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-17: byang chub rab la smon par bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-18: rab tu 'byung bar bgyi ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-19: bu khyod kyi ni rjes su slob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-24: gang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags lnga brgya tsam po de dag thams cad rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-26: de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba de gzhan yin snyam du sh'a ri'i bu khyod de ltar ma lta zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-28: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba ye shes rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351a-30: de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu dri ma med pa'i dpung pa zhes bya ba'i de gzhan yin pa snyam du the tshom mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-2: sh'a ri'i bu khyod de ltar ma lta zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-4: nga ni de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu dri ma med pa'i dpung pa zhes bya ba der gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-5: sh'a ri'i bu; 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas nga la bsod snyoms byin nas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-6: de ni ngas byang chub kyi phyir thog ma sems bskyed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-8: rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-12: ye shes chags pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-14: de thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byed du bcug pa las gyur par blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-16: sems bskyed pa de las thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-18: ngas ni phyogs bcu na nga bdag ci lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub la bzhag pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba dpag tu med grangs med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-19: de bzhin du ti sha zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-20: rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-21: gtsug ldan zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:351b-22: mar me mdzad ces bya ba dag mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-0: gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub la bzhag nas da ltar gyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan kyang @352a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-2: bskal pa'i lhag ma ma lus par brjod par gyur na gang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-3: gang dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa dag lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-4: gang skye ba dag lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-5: gang khyim nas 'byung ba dag lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-6: gang dka' ba spyod pa dag lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-7: gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dag lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-9: rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-10: gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-12: thugs rje ba'o; ;byed du 'jug pa'o zhes yang dag par smra zhing ston pa ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid la de dag smra zhing ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-16: sngon phan btags pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nga la byas pa mi gzo bas rgol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-17: de nas lha'i bu nyis brgya po dag 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-18: chos thams cad ni rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-20: sred pa'i rtsa ba can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-21: smon lam gyis thog drangs pa can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352a-22: bcom ldan 'das 'di'ang gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa yin na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par bzhugs bzhin du bdag cag dman pa la sems pa de ni mi rigs so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-0: de nas lha'i bu nyis brgya po de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas @352b bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-1: 'dir lag pa brkyang zhing rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i cho 'phrul 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas brtan cing lhung bzed blangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-2: 'di la sngon byung ba'i chos bstan pa bstan pa'i tshe 'og gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-3: 'di nas sems can grangs las 'das pas byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-4: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-5: chos kyi g-yog bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rin po che'i gdugs bskur bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-6: rin po che'i gdugs de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khebs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-7: rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-8: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas gsungs pa bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-9: bdag cag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub la bkod do zhes de skad zer ba'i sgra byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:352b-12: myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-0: sems can gang 'khor bas skrag nas bla na med pa @353a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-2: nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas la nyan thos su 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de dag ni da dung du'ang 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-3: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa thob par ngas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-6: sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-10: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos ni bye ba phrag brgya yod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-17: tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum thub par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi mchog shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge slong mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353a-20: nyan thos kyi mchog gnyis pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog ni shugs chen po zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs mnabs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-4: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i pho brang grags ldan zhes bya bar bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-5: de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yas phyogs nas ni nyan thos shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-6: g-yon phyogs nas ni nyan thos rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-7: rgyab nas ni mang du thos pa 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-8: mdun nas ni byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-9: la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-10: la la ni brgya byin gyi gzugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-11: la la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-12: la la ni lha'i gzugs kyis lam gyi byi dor byed cing 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-13: sh'a ri'i bu; de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa de rgyal po'i pho brang der gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-14: byis pa rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa gsum zhig lam gyi bar na rtse zhing 'dug pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-15: byis pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-20: zhi gnas mchog dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-23: rdzing bzhin du dvang la gsal zhing rnyog pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:353b-24: mchod sbyin gyi shing gser las byas pa ltar mngon par 'phags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-2: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa de rgyang ma nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-3: mthong nas khye'u gcig gis khye'u gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-4: khye'u khyed cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi mchog bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-5: 'jig rten du bcas pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas de gshegs pa mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-8: 'di la phul na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-9: de nas de'i tshe khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-10: 'di ni sems can kun gyi mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-11: sbyin gnas bla na med pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-12: de bas 'di la mchod par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-15: bdag cag la ni me tog dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-16: dri dang phye ma byug ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-17: 'jig rten gang zag zla med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-18: 'di la cis ni mchod par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-19: de nas khye'u des mu tig gi se mo do rin brgya stong ri ba lag pa g-yas pas mgul nas bkrol te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-20: bsod nams zhing ni bla na med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-21: de la 'dis ni mchod par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-22: 'di mthong nas ni mkhas pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354a-23: dngos po dag la su zhig chags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-0: khye'u gnyis po de dag khye'u de'i rjes su slob par gyur nas bdag bdag gi @354b mgul nas mu tig gi se mo do bkrol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-1: tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-2: yang dag rdzogs pa 'ong ba brgal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-3: mya ngan spangs pa sems grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-4: sdig med yang dag chos gnas la; ;bdag cag gnyis ni mchod pa bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-5: de nas khye'u des khye'u gnyis po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-6: khye'u khyed gnyis sbyin pa'i chos 'dis cir smon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-7: de nas khye'u gcig gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-8: bdag ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i g-yas phyogs na shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchod de ji lta bu bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-10: bdag ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i g-yon phyogs na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog de ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-11: de nas khye'u des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-12: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-14: phyogs thams cad du snang bar mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-15: seng ge'i 'gros su gshegs pa; 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du gyur cig ces sh'a ri'i bu khye'u des tshig de skad smras ma thag tu bar snang las lha'i bu brgyad stong gis legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-18: skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis tshig de legs par smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:354b-20: 'jig rten du bcas pa'i rten du sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-1: cad zil gyis gnon pas bsnyen bkur byed pa blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-3: khyod kyis khye'u mu tig gi se mo do thogs te 'ong ba 'di gsum mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-9: khye'u bar ma tshur 'ong ba 'di ni 'di 'dra ba'i bsam pas 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-11: 'jog pa thams cad la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-12: de bzhin du brgya byin 'thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-13: tshangs pa 'thob pa brgya stong yongs su len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-14: gom pa thams cad la sangs rgyas brgya stong mngon par mthong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su len to; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-15: de nas khye'u gsum po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas mu tig gi se mo do de bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355a-18: de'i tshe gang nyan thos kyi sems kyis mu tig gi se mo do gtor bar gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i phrag pa gnyis la 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-0: gang khye'u des thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyis mu tig gi se mo do gtor @355b bar gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbu'i gtsug gi steng na mu tig gi se mo do'i khang pa brtsegs ma rnam pa sna tshogs blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-3: kun nas rnam par phye bar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-4: khang pa brtsegs ma de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs par yang snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de 'dzum pa mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-6: chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-14: dngul gyi kha dog dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-15: de dag gi snang bas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-17: zla ba'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas slar log ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-18: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bor mi snang bar song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa dge slong blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:355b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-0: ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad ces de skad @356a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-4: khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nyan thos kyi sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mu tig gi se mo do gnyis gtor ba khyod kyis mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-10: khye'u 'di gnyis ni 'khor bas 'jigs skrag nas byang chub tu smon lam mi 'debs par bdag cag ni myur du mya ngan las 'das par bya'o snyam du de ltar sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-13: gang gi tshe na khye'u gsum pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-14: khye'u 'di gnyis ni de'i nyan thos kyi mchog tu 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-15: gcig ni shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-16: gnyis pa ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-18: de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u bar mar gyur cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de ni gzhan no snyam du the tshom mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-19: yid gnyis su gyur par sh'a ri'i bu de ltar ma lta zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356a-21: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u bar ma der gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-0: de'i tshe de'i dus na g-yas phyogs kyi khye'ur @356b gyur ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du de ltar ma lta zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-2: sh'a ri'i bu khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u der gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-3: dge slong moonggal gyi bu ni khye'u g-yon phyogs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa las khyed gnyis 'khor bas 'jigs skrag nas byang chub tu sems ma bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-6: sems zhum pas ci nas kyang bdag cag gis myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam byed mod kyi khyed gnyis kyis nga las thal bar ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-8: ngas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs nas khyed gnyis ni ngas chos bstan pas rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-10: rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-11: ci nas kyang myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod na thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-14: myur ba'i theg pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-15: mi slu ba'i theg pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-16: bde ba'i theg pa zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-17: 'bar ba'i theg pa zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-18: theg pa'i mchog ces bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-19: theg pa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-20: theg pa rab mchog ces bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-21: bla na med pa'i theg pa zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-22: ma chags pa'i theg pa zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:356b-24: rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i theg pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-1: cad mkhyen pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa ston pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-5: moonggal gyi bu chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-9: au pa li dang; byams ma'i bu gang po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-12: rigs kyi bu mos gus par bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-14: rgya chen po la'ang mos par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-15: smon lam rgya chen po'ang gdab par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-18: bdag cag la sangs rgyas brgya stong gis thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod cing bdag cag la chos bstan kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-20: bdag cag ni ma chags pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i skal ba ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-22: bdag cag ni mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang ldan na legs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog par 'gyur ba ni de lta ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357a-24: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-0: bdag cag mtshams @357b ma mchis pa lnga dang ldan na ni sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal sbyangs te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi chags pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-2: bdag cag ni bsam pa'i rgyud tshig pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi smod ma lags par gyur na da ji ltar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-7: skyes bu gum ste dus 'das par gyur na gnyen rnams kyis nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-9: nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-10: 'jig rten du bcas pa la sman mi thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-14: sa chen po 'di rkang gnyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-15: rkang bzhi pa rnams la sman 'dogs par gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-17: gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la sman 'dogs par gyur pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-19: gtam 'di brjod pa'i rjes la rgyal po ma skyes dgra dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:357b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-0: lan gsum bskor nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug @358a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-1: go ;phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-3: sems can rnams ci la gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-4: ci'i mthus na sdig pa'i las mngon par rtsom zhing bgyid par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-8: sems can rnams ni bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-10: srog dang; gang zag la gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-12: sems can rnams ni 'jig tshogs su lta ba la brten cing phyin ci log tu mngon du gyur pa la gnas nas sdig pa'i las mngon par rtsom zhing byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-15: 'jigs tshogs su lta ba'i rtsa ba gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-18: 'jig tshogs su lta ba ni ma rig pa'i rtsa ba las byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-21: ma rig pa'i rtsa ba gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-24: ma rig pa ni tshul bzhin yid la mi byed pa las byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358a-27: tshul bzhin yid la mi bgyid pa'i rtsa ba gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-0: tshul bzhin @358b yid la mi byed pa ni med pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i rtsa ba las byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-3: ma mchis pa la sgro 'dogs pa zhes bgyi ba ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-6: med pa la sgro 'dogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-7: ma byung ba la yongs su rtog pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-10: ma byung ba la yongs su rtog pa zhes bgyi ba'i rtsa ba gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-13: ma byung ba la yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus te ma byung ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-15: bcom ldan 'das 'dus te ma byung ba zhes bgyi ba ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-18: 'dus te ma byung ba zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir ma skyes ma byung bas de'i phyir 'dus te ma byung ba zhes bya'o; ;gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-20: gang mi 'byung ba de ci zhig bgrang 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-22: gang mi 'byung ba de la bgrang ba cung zad kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-25: 'gyod pa ci la dmigs pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-28: 'gyod pa ni the tshom la dmigs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-31: the tshom zhes bgyi ba ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-34: the tshom zhes bya ba ni gang 'phags pa yang dag par smra ba dag gis bshad pa la the tshom za ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:358b-35: de ni the tshom zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-3: yang dag par smra ba gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-5: rgyal po chen po; rdul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-6: lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir 'phags pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-8: gang dag gis chos thams cad 'dus te byung ba ma yin par rtogs pa ni yang dag par smra ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-9: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-10: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-12: 'jig rten gnas pa ni bdag gi bsam pa'i rgyud kyi nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-13: de ni 'phags pa yang dag par smra ba dag gis bshad pa la yid ma ches nas sdig pa'i las rnam pa du ma dag rtsol zhing bgyid pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-20: bdag gis kyang sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-24: nor gyis rgyags shing dregs pas phas ma nongs par srog bkum nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-26: bdag ni the tshom de med par bsal mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359a-32: don sgrub cing mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-0: slas @359b gyi nang du mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-2: 'gro ba mang po'i nang du mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-4: gdugs la'ang the tshom de bsal mi nus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-6: bdag ni g-yar zas kyi ro'ang mi bro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-8: bdag ni phyag la skom par yang mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-10: bdag ni gnyid kyang mi mchi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-12: bdag ni mdangs gsal ba'ang ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-14: bdag ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par skrag pa 'byung zhing mjug tu bdag sems can dmyal ba bar 'gyur ba'ang sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-16: khyod ni 'jig rten long bar gyur pa'i ni mig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-17: chab kyis ded pa rnams kyi ni 'dren pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-18: rgal 'tshal ba rnams kyi ni zam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-19: sdug bsngal ba rnams la ni bde ba stsol ba; dbul po rnams kyi ni gter /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-20: lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la ni lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-23: sems can thams cad la snyoms par dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-27: sdug bsngal bas mi bskyod pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can gang yang ma btang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-30: bdag 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-31: mgon ma mchis pa'i mgon du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-32: skyabs ma mchis pa'i skyabs su gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:359b-33: long ba'i ni mig tu gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-1: kyis 'tshal ba la ni phyag gis drang bar mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-3: bdag mnar ma mchis pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-4: skrag pa chen por ltung ba la; ci nas kyang the tshom de bsal nas kun tu dkris pa ma mchis par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-5: bdag gi sug las de'ang myong ba chung ngu 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-7: kye ma'o rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di ni sred pa la spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-8: chos zab mo la dad pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-9: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs pa gzhan sus kyang 'di'i the tshom lhag ma ma lus par sel mi nus snyam dgongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-10: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-12: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sang bshos la spyan drongs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-13: des khyod kyi the tshom ngan pa de'ang bsal bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-15: khyod kyi nang gi 'gro ba de thams cad kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-16: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por yang sems can tshad med pa dag gi don byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360a-17: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-1: bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sang bshos la gshegs par dgongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-2: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-8: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la gos len pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-10: zas len pa de ni thugs brtse ba ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-12: khyod gang gi tshe zab mo'i don dam pa bdag med pa la the tshom med pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-13: nem nur med par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-14: de lta bu ni khyod la thugs brtse bar byas pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-16: gang gi tshe khyod chos gang la'ang rtog par yang ma gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-17: rnam par rtog par yang ma gyur na de lta bu ni khyod la thugs brtse bar byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-19: gang gi tshe na khyod sems 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-21: da ltar du rtog pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-22: rnam par rtog pa med na de lta bu ni khyod la thugs brtse bar byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-25: khyod lta ba chung ngu'ang skyed par yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-26: 'gog par yang mi byed na de lta bu ni khyod la thugs brtse bar byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-27: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:360b-28: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:361a-0: chos kyi chos nyid ni de lta lags @361a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:361a-2: 'on kyang bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sang 'khor dang bcas te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362a-19: mngon par mi bya ba de la ni bya ba'ang med /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362a-34: mngon par 'du byed pa la mngon par 'du mi byed par mos pa yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362b-8: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362b-9: mun pa ni gdugs kyi 'od zer gyis bsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362b-12: 'o na ci mun pa de phung po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362b-13: phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur ram; gsol pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362b-23: lam mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa mnyam pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362b-24: nyon mongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362b-28: de ltar nyon mongs pa tshol ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:362b-29: yang gang nyon mongs pa tshol ba de ni lam yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:363a-13: de ltar lam bsgoms na gar mchi bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:363a-16: de ltar lam bsgoms na gar yang mi 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:363a-19: lam ni mya ngan las 'da' bar mchi ba ma lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:363a-22: ci mya ngan las 'da' ba la chos gang gi'ang lam yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:363a-28: de lta bas na 'phags pa rnams kyi lam bsgom pa ni 'gro bas 'gro bar bya ba ma yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:363b-17: 'phags pa dag ni gnas med pa la gnas te lam sgom mo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:363b-21: rigs kyi bu mo lam la zhugs pa lags /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:363b-37: lam la zhugs pa zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364a-6: gang yongs su grol ba de dag kyang med pas yongs su grol lo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364a-15: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364a-22: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364a-24: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364a-25: dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi zhabs la'ang mgo bos phyag btsal te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-0: @364b de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i g-yog ji snyed cig mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-5: byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dag dang thabs gcig tu bshos gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-6: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer ga la ba dang; bdag gi khang pa gang na bar song ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-10: bldag ba bzang zhing mang ba sbyor du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-11: zas ro brgya pa'ang sbyor du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-12: bdag gnas pa'i khang bar yang dar gyi lda ldi bres shing gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-14: ba dan gyis kun tu brgyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-15: dar gyi bla res kyang bres /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-17: gnas khang der khri gos du mas g-yogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-18: rin po che'i rnam pa sna tshogs du mas spras pa lnga brgya'ang btsugs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-20: zhal zhal legs par byugs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-21: bdugs pas bdugs nas me tog gi sil mas kyang gang bar gtor du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-22: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i 'phong sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:364b-25: tshong 'dus thams cad du'ang chag chag legs par btab /
