K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-2: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i 'gro ba thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las byed par bskos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-3: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang na gnas pa las nub mo thun dang po la 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-4: gang bdag ni 'khor nyung ngu dang rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab tu zas bza' ba'i mi rigs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-5: gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas byang chub sems dpa' dag gnyer la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-6: de dag the tshom gcod pa'i chos kyang nyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-7: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i zas kyang bza' bar bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-8: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-10: skyes bu stobs po che'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-11: brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam du de'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam la bdag gi gtsug lag khang du mi snang bar gyur nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag brgyad cu 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya bar phyin par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsgrags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365a-15: byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-0: de @365b na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo gcig kyang bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-1: yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyu rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i shing me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-2: 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-3: rin po che'i shing de dag rlung gis btab pa las sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra skad 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams der dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra dang mi 'bral bas na rtag tu sgra sgrogs zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsgrags pa'i dpal de'i zhabs la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgo bos phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsgrags pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab tu bdag dang lhan cig tu mchod ston 'tshal bar bka' stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:365b-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsgrags pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-0: khyed las gang 'dod pa rnams 'jam dpal @366a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-1: gzhon nur gyur pa dang 'grogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-2: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri nyis stong gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-5: bdag cag ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang mchod ston 'tshal du mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-6: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de nyid kyi thang cig skad cig yud tsam la byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri nyis stong po de dag dang 'grogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu sgra sgrogs nas mi snang bar gyur te bdag gi gtsug lag khang du 'dug go /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-9: de la gzungs gang zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-17: 'bras bu thob nas srung bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-18: lam skyon med pa la 'jug shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366a-19: chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu tha dad pa shes pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-5: 'khor thams cad du ma zhum pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-7: lha'i skad du ston pa shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-8: klu'i skad du ston pa shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-18: tshangs pa'i skad du ston pa shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-21: log par lta ba yongs su shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-22: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la rtog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-23: sems sa dang mtshungs par gzhog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-24: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi bskyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-25: chos dkar po thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-26: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-27: sems can thams cad kyi nye ba'i 'tsho bar rtsol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-28: tshul khrims kyi gzhi sems can thams cad la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-29: ye shes thams cad kyi rjes su song ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-30: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi khur khyer yang sems skyo zhing dmus byung ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-31: chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-32: rang bzhin ston cing brjod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:366b-33: chos kyi sbyin pas spro bar byed kyi sems skye bar mi byed pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:367b-29: gzungs ni mi rtag pas chos thams cad 'dzin to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:367b-34: rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:367b-36: mngon par byas pa med pas chos thams cad 'dzin te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:367b-41: sa 'di ni skye bo thams cad 'dzin mod kyi 'gas par yang mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:368a-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa'ang @368a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369a-17: rang bzhin ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'dzin to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369a-23: lam skyon med par gyur pa ni chos thams cad la byed pa med 'dzin pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369a-25: de bzhin du gzungs kyang chos thams cad mi 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369a-28: gang gzungs de ni mi zad pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369a-30: gang tshad med pa de ni kun gyi rjes su song ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369a-31: gang kun gyi rjes su song ba de ni nam mkha'i dbyings so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369a-35: gzungs de gnyis ni rnam pa gnyis su med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369a-36: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzungs 'di ston pa bstan pa'i tshe 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas gzungs thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369b-0: thun dbu ma la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher @369b bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369b-1: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa gang zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369b-9: gang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:369b-10: gang zag pa dang bcas pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:370a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par bsdu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:370a-7: thag pa chen por bsdu ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:370b-2: de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la spyod pa de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro ma gtogs par chos kyi gzhan gyi ro mi 'thung ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:370b-5: 'di gsum ni sde snod yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:370b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:370b-24: byang chub sems dpa' ni chos 'chad na sems can dag theg pa gsum gyis 'byung bas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la sde snod gsum pa zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371a-11: nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la mi slob cing mi shes so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371a-15: nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod par yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371a-16: theg pa des 'byung bar yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371a-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la'ang slob cing shes mod kyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob cing shes la theg pa chen po des 'byung bar byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371a-21: byung nas kyang nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'ang ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371a-22: rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'ang ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par grol ba'ang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-2: gang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la spyod pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-6: nor bu bee d'urya'i snod kyi nang du ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-7: ci bcug pa de thams cad de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-9: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-10: gang 'tshal ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin nyid rjod par byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-13: gang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ma yin pa de dag mi mthong ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-16: chos thams cad tshul bzhin du mthong bas chos gang yang sangs rgyas kyi chos su mi brjod pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni yi ges bshad pa mtha' yas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-19: yi ge'i 'bru gzhag pa tshad med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:371b-20: snang bas gsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-0: de ltar mos pa ni sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid du gzhug pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen @372a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-1: pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-2: gang dag bslab pa de la slob cing slob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pas theg pa chen po de rtogs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-3: de'ang byed pa med par rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mtshan mo'i thun par ma'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-6: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mtshan mo thun tha ma'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i tshig la 'jug pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-8: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'chad pa las sems can gang dag gis chos 'chad pa de mnyan nas de dag thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rtogs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-9: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bshad pa las slar mi ldog pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-11: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can sna tshogs su mi spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-12: chos sna tshogs su mi spyod; theg pa sna tshogs su mi spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su mi spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372a-14: sangs rgyas sna tshogs su mi spyod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-0: chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni thams cad kyi rjes @372b su zhugs par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-1: chos kyi dbyings tha dad par yang chos kyi 'khor lo de mi bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-2: de bas na phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-3: 'khor lo de ni yongs su ma chad pa'i 'khor lo'o; ;gnyis su med pa'i 'khor lo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-4: ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa'i 'khor lo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-5: rang byung ba'i ye shes rtogs pa'i 'khor lo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-6: 'khor lo de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o; ;rigs kyi bu dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po gang dag mtshan ma thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'di la mos par 'gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-9: mos par 'gyur ba de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol bas rnam par grol bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-10: rnam par grol ba ni gnyis su'ang mi ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyang de yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-13: chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-14: chos gang mtshan nyid med pa de ni rnam par grol ba'ang med mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-17: lus dang bral ba de ni rnam par grol ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-19: gang lus de ni rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-21: rnam par grol ba de sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:372b-22: lus kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-1: na ye shes de gzhan la rag ma las pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-2: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-5: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ni slar mi ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-7: gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin las mi ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-8: de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-11: rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin las mi ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-13: chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings de las mi ldog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-14: chos kyi dbyings de ni ji lta ba bzhin yin pas na phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-15: 'khor lo de ni dbus su 'jug pa'ang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-16: 'khor lo de ni tshad pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-18: de la ni sgo cung zad kyang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-19: de ni gnyis su med pa'i sgo'i 'khor lo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-20: 'khor lo de ni skor ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-22: 'khor lo de ni ston pa cung zad kyang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-24: 'khor lo de ni sgrogs pa cung zad kyang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-26: yang phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo de ni stong pa nyid kyi sgo la gnas pas mtshan ma med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-27: rnam par grol ba'i sgo la gnas pas mtshan nyid med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-28: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373a-29: de'ang de'i rjes su yang dag par song ba'i rang bzhin nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-0: de bas na phyir @373b mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-2: rdo rje'i tshig ni gang chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-3: yang chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-5: stong pa nyid ni rdo rje'i tshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-6: lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-8: mtshan ma med pa ni rdo rje'i tshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-9: rnam par rtog pa thams cad las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-11: smon pa med pa ni rdo rje'i tshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-12: 'gro ba thams cad las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-14: chos kyi dbyings ni rdo rje'i tshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-17: de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje'i tshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-20: 'dod chags dang bral ba ni rdo rje'i tshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-21: 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-23: mya ngan las 'das pa ni rdo rje'i tshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-24: chos rnams de'i rang bzhin du ston to zhes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la mtshan thog thag tu chos rgya cher bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-25: de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ting nge 'dzin 'od zer gyi me tog ces bya ba mngon du grub par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:373b-26: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas ba spu'i khung bu'i 'od zer re re las kyang sangs rgyas brgya stong ston cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas @374a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-1: kyi zhing na sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par mngon du bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-2: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-7: bshos lags kyi de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig ces pho nya gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-8: de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs bgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-11: dge slong lnga brgya dang 'grogs nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-12: de lam gyi tshigs su phyin pa dang 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-13: grong khyer chen por 'gro ba ha cang snga ches kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-14: gang bdag ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-15: de na gtam gyi rgyun cig yod par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-16: de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-17: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-18: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-19: mgu ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374a-20: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-0: @374b che dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-1: ci'i phyir na nang par sngar sham thabs bgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-6: bdag ni bsod snyoms kyi slad du rgyal po'i khab tu mchi bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor dang bcas pa la bdag gis bshos gsol gyi dgongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-10: 'jam dpal bgyis shing mchod par 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-12: zang zing 'tshal pa ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-14: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-16: zang zing gis bsdu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-17: chos kyis bsdu ba gnyis ka khyod la 'du bar mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-20: bdag ni 'tshal mchad kyang khyod kyi slad bzhin du 'brang ma 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-21: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-22: chos ston pa de ni ji ltar khyod kyi drung nas thos pa 'dra bar gzhan las mi thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-24: de ring sems can chen po de dag dang gang du bshos gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-26: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-27: gang gi tshe bdag cag la sbyin pa byin nas 'khor ba las kyang mi bskyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-28: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rtogs par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-29: so so'i skye bo'i sa las kyang mi 'da'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-30: 'phags pa'i chos mngon par yang mi byed pa de'i zas de ring 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:374b-31: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-1: la sbyin pa byin nas 'bri bar yang mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-3: chos gang yang skyed par yang mi bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-5: chos gang gtong bar yang mi bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-6: thob par yang mi bgyid pa de'i zas de ring 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-9: de ltar sbyin par bgyid pa de dang de dag ni sbyin bdag chen po lags kyi ma chi'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-11: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-12: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-13: yang de'i tshe na ting nge 'dzin rdzu 'phrul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-14: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rdzu 'phrul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur to; ;stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-15: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yang rgyun chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-16: byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-17: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yang rgyun chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375a-18: sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-5: gnod 'chab par gyur pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-6: de'i tshe sems can thams cad gcig la gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-7: mar 'du shes shing byams pa la gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-10: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang; 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod par bya ba'i las la brtson par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-11: sil snyan brgya stong yang dkrol bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-12: me tog dri zhim po'i char yang mngon par bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-13: lam gyi byi dor kyang byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-14: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas gtsug lag khang de'i sgo nas bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-15: grong khyer gyi sgo'i bar du de'i bar gyi lam thams cad lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-16: rin po che du ma ni bsags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-17: rin po che du mas ni spras /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-18: rin po che'i stegs bus ni bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-19: zhing du shing rta bdun tsam du me tog padma dmar po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-22: steng nas ni rin po che'i dra bas g-yogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-23: dar gyi lda ldi mang po ni bres /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-27: ru mtshon ni bsgreng bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:375b-28: rin po che'i stegs bu gnyis kyi g-yas g-yon du mnga' rgyang re re tsam na rin po che'i shing yod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-1: po che'i shing thams cad las rin po che'i shing gnyis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-2: rin po che'i srad bus sprel bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-3: rin po che'i shing re re las kyang gang dri byung bar gyur pa'i dri des ni dpag tshad gcig kho na khor yug tu khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-4: rin po che'i shing gnyis kyi bar na rdzing bu sprul par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-5: gser gyi bye ma ni bkram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-6: rin po che'i stegs bus ni bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-7: nor bu bee d'urya'i skas ni zug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-13: chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas ni yongs su gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-14: shing thams cad la rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-15: gser gyi dra ba ni bres par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-16: rin po che'i shing thams cad kyi bar na rin po che'i phog phor nas spos kyis ni bdugs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-17: rin po che'i shing thams cad kyi drung na lha'i bu mo nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga sbrul yod pa nas byung ba'i tsandan gyi snying po'i phye ma thogs te 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-18: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe ngo mtshar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-19: rmad du byung ba 'di dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-21: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sham thabs bgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376a-22: gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-0: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen @376b po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-1: khyod ni mdun du bzhud cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-2: bdag ni khyod kyi slad bzhin du mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-4: gnas brtan 'od srung chen po ni bgres la rab tu byung nas kyang yun ring ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong bar rab tu byung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-6: gang 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa de'i rjes su rab tu byung bas de bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-7: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-8: khyod ni mdun du bzhud cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-9: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-10: 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-12: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las ni su'ang nas rgan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-13: lo grangs kyis rgan pa zhes mi bgyi yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-15: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las ni shes rab kyis rgan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-18: dbang po shin tu rnam par phye ba la rgan pa zhes bgyi la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-20: khyod kyang shes rab kyis bgres /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-24: dam pa ma lags par mkhyen pa la mkhas pas de'i slad du khyod nyid thu bo bgres pa lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-26: bdag ni khyod kyi slad bzhin du mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:376b-28: don 'di nyid shin tu bshad pa'i slad du skabs 'dir bdag gis dpe tsam zhig bshad par spobs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:377a-0: seng ge'i phrug gu byung nas ring @377a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:377a-1: bo ma lon pa ni bdag gi stobs kyi shugs ma rdzogs mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:377a-2: seng ge'i phrug gu de'i dri rlung gis gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:377a-3: gang du khyer ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:377a-4: de dag tu ri dvags thams cad dri de mi bzod nas 'bros par bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:377a-5: bal glang glang po che chen po lo drug cu lon pa /
