K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-1: mtshams ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang na mtha' yang ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-2: dbus kyang ma mchis pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-3: gang na mtha' yang ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-4: dbus kyang ma mchis pa de la bdag gnas par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-7: rgyal po chen po 'dis ni shes rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-8: ye shes kyi lam sbyangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-9: de bas na 'di 'dra ba'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-12: chos thams cad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-14: shin tu nyon ma mongs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-15: de dag ni kun nas nyon mongs par bgyi mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-16: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las ni lam lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-17: lam de'ang 'khor bar yang mi mchi; mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi mchi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-18: lam de ni gang du'ang mi 'dren te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-20: bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgras mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394a-21: bud med sum khri nyis stong gis ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'phrul pa mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-0: nang gi skye bo srog chags lnga brgya ni chos la @394b chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-1: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang chos nyan par 'dod pa srog chags stong phrag mang po dag byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-2: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab kyi sgo na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa byed pa'i las byang ba'i phyir 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-3: de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rkang pa'i mthe bos sa chen po 'di la bsnun no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-4: bsnun ma thag tu yang sa chen po 'di thams cad rgyu bee d'urya las byas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-5: de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-8: bu mo thams cad kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-9: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-10: nyan thos chen po de dag mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-13: me long shin tu gsal ba'i nang du bzhin mthong ba de bzhin du de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-14: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ci nas kyang srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-15: srog chags lnga brgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:394b-16: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-0: 'khor dang bcas te rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab nas @395a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-2: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang 'khor dang bcas te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs pa las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs pas phyogs gzhan zhig na mi zhig gis ma'i srog bcad nas de shing zhig gi drung na du zhing mya ngan byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-3: bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-4: bdag ni nges par sems can dmyal bar 'gro'o zhes zer zhing 'dug pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-5: mi de'ang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'dul bar gyur pa zhig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-6: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyes bu de gdul ba'i phyir skyes bu gzhan zhig mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-7: skyes bu de'i pha ma'ang mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-8: de nas skyes bu sprul pa de pha ma dang 'grogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-9: skyes bu ma gsod pa de ga la ba der song nas ha cang yang rgyang mi ring ba zhig nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-10: ci nas kyang skyes bu yang dag pa des mthong bar 'gyur pa de ltar rtsod par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-15: lam 'di ma yin no zhes de dag 'thab par gyur pa las skyes bu sprul pa des pha dang ma'i srog bcad par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395a-16: skyes bu yang dag pas skyes bu de'i pha dang ma'i srog bcad pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-0: de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu des pha ma'i srog bcad nas skyes bu yang @395b dag pa de ga la ba der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-2: bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-4: ma'i srog bcad pas bdag ni nges par sems can dmyal bar mchi'o zhes de skad smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-5: skyes bu yang dag pas de thos nas 'di snyam du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-6: bdag gis ni ma 'ba' zhig gi sog bcad du zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-7: skyes bu 'dis ni pha ma gnyis ka'i srog bcad pas skyes bu 'dis sdig pa'i las cher byas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-8: 'di gar 'gro ba bdag kyang der 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-9: sprul pa'i skyes bu de du zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-11: bdag ni bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i drung du mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-13: bcom ldan 'das de ni sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-14: sems can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par mdzad pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-15: bcom ldan 'das de ci gsung ba bzhin du nan tan bya'o zhes de skad smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-16: de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-17: skyes bu yang dag pa de'ang skyes bu 'di gar 'gro bar bdag kyang der 'gro bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:395b-18: bdag kyang der 'gro'o zhes de'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs so; ;de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das @396a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-3: bdag gis pha ma'i srog bcad na bcom ldan 'das bdag la skyabs mdzad par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-4: bdag gis de ji ltar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i skyes bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-8: kye skyes bu khyod ni bden par smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-10: ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-11: gang khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bden pa'i tshig smras te mi slu ba yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-12: skyes bu khyod sems kyi rgyud la rtogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-16: sems gang gis pha ma'i srog bcad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-17: 'das pa'i sems ni zad pa dang bral ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-18: 'gags pa gzhan du gyur pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-20: phyogs na'ang mi gnas pas de ni gdags su mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-21: ma 'ongs pa ni ma phyin pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-24: yang dag par ma byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-29: de'ang gdags su mi nus so; ;da ltar gyi sems ni gnas pa med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396a-30: skyes nas zhig cing dengs bar 'gyur ba phung por ma gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-2: sems ni nang gi lus la'ang mi 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-3: phyi rol gyi yul du'ang mi rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-4: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-6: sems ni sngon po ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-11: shel gyi kha dog ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-19: de'ang gdags su mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-25: sems ni mngon par 'du mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-29: myong bar byed pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-31: sems ni rang bzhin gyis dvang ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-32: de ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-37: gnyis ka med par yang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-41: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-43: rnam par rig par mi 'gyur ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-44: de la mkhas pas mngon par chags par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-48: bdag tu bsam par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:396b-49: bdag gir bsam par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-0: chos thams cad ni rang bzhin @397a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-1: gyis nus pa med pas g-yo ba med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-3: nga ni de ltar mos pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-6: mtho ris su 'gro bar mi smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-8: gang sems kyi chos nyid de ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la skyes bu sprul pa des 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-15: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-17: rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-20: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-23: bde bar gshegs pa rab tu dbyung bar gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-25: tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad gsungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-26: de'i mod la de rab tu byung bar snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-28: bdag gis mngon par bgyi ba thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397a-29: mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo zhes de skad kyang smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-0: dge slong de sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la shing ta la gang tsam du 'phags @397b nas; bdag gi me'i khams kyis lus bsregs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-1: skyes bu yang dag pa des chos bstan pa 'di dag thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-2: 'os [?] nas [?] kyang 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-3: skyes bu des ni pha dang; ma gnyis ka'i srog bcad kyang de yongs su mya ngan las 'das na bdag gis ni ma 'ba' zhig gi srog bcad du zad pas ci'i phyir bdag yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-4: de de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-7: bdag gis kyang ma'i srog bkum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-11: skyes bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ma bslus mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-12: kye skyes bu khyod sems gang gis ma'i srog bcad pa sems kyi rgyud la rtogs shig ces rgya cher bka' stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-13: zhib tu sprul pa'i skyes bu ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-14: de nas de'i tshe skyes bu de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas sems can dmyal ba'i me byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-15: de tshig cing mgon med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-16: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:397b-18: bdag ni tshig par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu skyes bu de'i spyi bor bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-3: phyag bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-4: skyes bu de'i tshor ba de thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-5: de lus bag yangs shing bde bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu gus par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-8: bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-9: bde bar gshegs pas rab tu dbyung bar gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-11: tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces de skad bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-12: de'i tshe de nyid du de mgo bregs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-15: kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-16: dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam du gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-17: de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog ces gsungs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-18: mgo bregs lus ni chos gos sbyar mar ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-19: de ma thag tu dbang po rab zhi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-20: sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i cha lugs gnas par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i gtam bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-0: des de thos nas chos la rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi mig rnam par @398b dag pa'i steng du'ang lam bsgoms nas dgra bcom par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-1: des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-3: bdag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-5: bdag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus dang man la bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-7: dge slong khyod da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-8: des de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-9: bdag me'i khams kyis lus bsregs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-10: bsregs pa de'i tshe sol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-11: thal ba'ang med par gyur nas lha brgya stong dag kyang de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus skyes bu de'i gdul ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-15: de la ni mtshams ma mchis pa dang ldan pa dag kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-20: sems can rnams kyi dbang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'tshal ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:398b-21: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang de 'dra @399a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-1: ba'i go cha dag bgos pa ma gtogs par gzhan su'i yul lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-3: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni yul ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-7: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-8: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa la gnas pa rnams kyi yul yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-11: gang zag gang khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba par shes la de dag la ngas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du mthong ba'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-13: khyod kyis gang zag gang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-17: ting nge 'dzin tsam dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-18: de la khyed kyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du shes mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-19: de la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dmyal ba par gzigs pa'ang yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-20: sh'a ri'i bu khyod ni sems can gyi spyod pa la bsam pa dang bral bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-23: sems can gyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399a-25: gang gis ma bsad nas chos bstan pa 'di la gnas te yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa'i skyes bu de khyod kyis mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-4: skyes bu des ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-6: sems rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i chos bshad pa 'di'ang thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-8: skyes bu des chos bstan pa 'di thos nas chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i phyir rnam par grol bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-11: rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-14: nga mya ngan las 'das pa na'ang zab mo chags pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-15: 'gro ba med pa 'di lta bu'i chos bstan pa nyan la thos nas kyang mos par byed na sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-16: sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i 'du byed dag mngon par byed kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-17: ma lus par rnam par grol bar ma gyur gyi bar du chos la rtogs pa de gtong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-19: gang dag chos 'di 'dra ba la mos par gyur pa de dag ni 'gro ba ngan par 'gro bar nga mi smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-21: de bas na gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las chung du na rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:399b-23: gzhan la ston pa'i sems can de dag nges par thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur bar blta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-0: gang dag thos nas tshul bzhin @400a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-1: du byed pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-2: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-3: 'od srung chen po la sogs pa nyan thos dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-4: rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-6: skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang 'grogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-10: khyod kyi 'gyod pa de bsal tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-17: ci nas kyang mi len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-18: mi gtong ba de ltar bsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-19: ci nas kyang slan chad shin tu nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-20: ci nas kyang thob pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-21: 'phrogs pa'ang med pa de ltar bsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-24: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i las kyi lhag ma ci tsam zhig ni lus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-25: ci tsam zhig ni lhag ma ma lus par byang zhing slan chad mi skye ba'i chos can du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400a-28: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i las kyi lhag ma yungs kar gyi 'brum bu tsam ni lus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-0: ri rab @400b ri'i rgyal po tsam ni chos zab mo 'di bstan pa khong du chud pas lhag ma ma lus par byang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-1: phyin chad mi skye ba'i chos can du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-4: rgyal po ma skyes dgra sems can dmyal bar mchi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-9: lha'i bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs ma na 'dug pa las sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas nas dzambu'i gling du 'bab cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-10: dzambu'i gling du babs nas slar yang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su 'dzeg pa de bzhin du rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang so so'i sems can dmyal ba me tog punda r'i ka zhes bya bar babs nas de bzhin du 'dzegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-11: de lus la sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba reg par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-14: rgyal po ma skyes dgra ni dbang po rno ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-15: des las kyi sgrib pa myong bar 'gyur ba 'di tsam zhig tu bgyis pa ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-18: rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-19: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la 'dis bsnyen bkur yang byas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:400b-20: de dag las chos kyang thos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos par gyur @401a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-6: sh'a ri'i bu; 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di bskal pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bzang zhes bya ba'i gsung rab las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-9: bskal pa dri ma med pa la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gsum gyur ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-10: de thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-11: tshe ring bar gsol bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-13: rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas stong gis kyang chos bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-14: 'gyod pa de bsal bar bya ba'i gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-17: 'di nyid kyis gdul ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-18: phyi phyir zhing 'dis chos zab mo bstan pa 'di nyid las thos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-21: rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-23: gang dag byang chub sems dpa' gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-24: gang las 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401a-25: de nyid kyi chos bstan pa shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401b-0: rgyal @401b po ma skyes dgra 'di'ang so so'i sems can dmyal ba me tog punda ri ka ltar gas pa de nas byung nas rma med cing ma rmas par steng gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi stong bzhi brgya 'das pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401b-1: de 'jig rten gyi khams brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401b-2: de der skyes ma thag tu slar yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401b-3: chos zab mo bstan pa 'di'ang thos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401b-4: thos nas kyang de nyid du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401b-5: gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe'ang slar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi g-yo ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401b-7: de na'ang byams pa de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' mi g-yo ba la sogs pa la sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam brjod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:401b-8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang ma lhag ma bri bar brjod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402a-1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi g-yo ba 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i gsung rab la rgyal po ma skyes dgra zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402a-2: des pha'i srog bcad nas des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las thos te mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402a-3: de'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang ma lus par byang bar gyur to zhes de skad kyang brjod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402a-6: byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi g-yo ba la sogs pa la ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402a-7: de na byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri nyis stong gi las kyi sgrib pa bskal pa grangs med pa nas bsags pa'ang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro; ;rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di de phan chad bskal pa grangs med pa phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du sems can yongs su smin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402a-10: sems can gang dag des nyan thos kyi theg pas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-0: @402b theg pa chen pos yongs su smin par byas par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-1: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-2: de dag thams cad dbang po rno bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-6: rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di bskal pa grangs med pa phrag brgyad brgya na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-7: bskal pa mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams 'dam gyi rnyog pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-8: de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bar ma bzhir 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-9: de'i nyan thos kyi tshogs ni bdun 'bum du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-10: thams cad kyang shes rab kyis mos pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-11: de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bye ba phrag bcu gnyis su 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-13: shes rab las byung ba sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:402b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos ni lo bye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-0: 'dam gyi dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gang yang 'gyod pa la @403a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-1: gnas shing 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-2: de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'gro ba ngan pa gsum du skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa yul shin tu rnam par dag pa de la sems can gang dag chos nyan pa de dag kun nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-7: gang gang zag gis gang zag la drod ma zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-8: gang zag gis gang zag la drod bzung na nyams par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-11: gang nga dang 'dra bas ni gang zag la drod zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-13: thams cad yod pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar thob nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-15: bdag cag ni deng phan chad sems can gang la'ang sems can dmyal bar mchi bar mthus lung mi ston to; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-17: sems can gyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes de skad kyang smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403a-18: rgyal po ma skyes dgra lung ston pa'i bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403b-0: gang gi tshe na bcom ldan 'das de @403b bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yul shin tu rnam par dag pas byang chub thob par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dam gyi dri ma med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar shog cig ces sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam yang btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403b-1: de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403b-2: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu ni tshod kyis le brgyad lon pa'i khye'u zla ba'i dpal zhes bya ba des mgul pa nas rgyan bkrol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403b-3: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gtor nas 'di skad kyi tshig kyang smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403b-5: bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403b-7: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nam bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yul shin tu rnam par dag pas byang chub thob par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403b-8: bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:403b-9: bdag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das @404a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-1: pa'i sku gdung la'ang bdag ma chod pa bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-3: de mya ngan las 'das nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces rgyan de dag gtor ma thag tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-4: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma cha mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-5: shin tu phye ba zhig 'dug par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-6: khang pa brtsegs ma de na khri rin po ches spras pa'i rtsa ba btsugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-7: gos bkram pa zhig byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-8: khri de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan nyid kyis kun tu brgyan pa zhig bzhugs par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-9: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-10: chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer kha dog du ma sna tshogs 'byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404a-19: dngul gyi kha dog dag byung ba de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-0: zla @404b ba'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas slar log ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-1: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bor mi snang bar song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-5: ye shes khyad par thams cad pha rol phyin pa thub pa chags med 'od gtong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-6: sems can pha rol gyi ni sems kyi spyod pa gang gi ci 'dra ba yang mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-7: dbang po sna tshogs mkhyen pas khyod kyang chos rnams de bzhin du ni 'chang mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-8: khyod kyis ci phyir bdag la 'dzum pa bstan pa 'gro ba kun gyi mchog gsungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-9: sems can phyogs bcu dag na gnas pa kun kyang khyod kyi mdun du 'dug gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-10: thub pa la ni re re zhing yang zhu ba bye ba khrag khrig zhu bgyid kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-11: khyod kyis skad cig nyid du de dag gi ni the tshom ma lus gcod par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-12: 'jig rten mgon po khyod kyis 'dzum pa bstan pa de yi rgyu ni bdag la gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:404b-13: sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang stobs bcu ldan pa'i rgyal ba gang dag bzhugs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-0: gang dag rgyal ba mang po ma byon rnams dang sems can rnams ni dpag @405a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-2: thams cad pha rol phyin pa khyod kyis de dag mkhyen cing gang la'ang chags pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-3: ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan pa rdul dang bral bas bdag gi the tshom chod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-4: khyod kyi 'od kyis tshangs pa dbang po nyi ma zla ba lha rnams zil gyis mnan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-5: ri dang khor yug rtse mo dag las thal nas khyod kyi 'od kyang gsal bar gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-6: reg nas sems can brgya dag bde bas dga' zhing nyon mongs pa yang ldang mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-7: nyon mongs thams cad dgrol ba khyod kyis 'dzum 'di ci phyir mdzad pa bdag la gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-8: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-11: khyod kyis khye'u zla ba'i dpal 'di mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-17: khye'u zla ba'i dpal 'dis nga'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405a-19: khye'u 'dis rim gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas nam de bzhin gshegs pa yul shin tu rnam par dag pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-0: khye'u zla ba'i dpal 'di'ang 'jig rten gyi khams der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal @405b por 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-1: des de bzhin gshegs pa yul shin tu rnam par dag pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la nam 'tsho'i bar du bkur sti byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sku gdung la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-6: de ni der de bzhin gshegs pa'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de nas bstan pa'ang nub nas dga' ldan du tshe zad par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-7: bskal pa de nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-10: tshe'i tshad kyang de dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-11: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang de dang mnyam par 'gyur ro; ;de nas gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang 'grogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:405b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-0: sa phyogs gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa de na de bzhin gshegs @406a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-1: pas stong pa ma lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-2: der ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs par bgyi mi 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-3: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams ni 'gro ba ngan pa'i 'jigs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-8: nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-16: dgon pa gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs de'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas stong pa ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-17: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-18: gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brtson par blta bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-19: gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de ni de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su spyad par blta bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-20: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406a-24: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-0: gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs de ni de @406b bzhin gshegs pas spyad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-3: sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga lung bstan par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-4: sa'i phyogs gang du ngas ral pa bting zhing ngas bzod pa thob par gyur pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis nga bzod pa thob par mkhyen nas khye'u 'di bskal pa grangs med pa na sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad des dge slong gi dge 'dun la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-7: khyed sus kyang sa phyogs 'di rkang pas ma bcags shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-9: gang du khye'u 'dis ral pa bting zhing bzod pa thob pa de ni lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du bcas pa'i mchod rten yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-10: yang sa'i phyogs 'dir mchod rten byed par su spro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-11: zhes de skad bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-13: de na lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-15: sa phyogs 'dir mchod rten bgyi bar bdag cag spro'o zhes mgrin gcig tu tshig smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:406b-16: de na khyim bdag lha bzang zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa des kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-0: @407a *// bdag gis sa phyogs 'dir mchod rten bgyi bar spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-3: sa phyogs der khyim bdag lha bzang zhes bya ba des mchod rten rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhig byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-4: byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-5: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-7: bdag gis sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-9: bdag gis bsod nams ji tsam zhig bgyis par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-10: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis khyim bdag lha bzang la sa'i phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa'i sa phyogs de shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyis ji snyed pa 'og tu chu'i phung po la thug gi bar dus chen po de sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-13: gang gis chu'i phung po nas 'khor ba'i rtse mo'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407a-14: gang khyod kyis mchod rten byas pa 'di de bas bsod nams shin tu mang mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407b-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ni ji ltar khye'u 'di ngas da ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du 'di byang chub thob nas khyod @407b pa lung ston par 'gyur ro zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag lha bzang zhes bya ba de gzhan du gyur pa snyam du de ltar ma blta zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407b-5: khyim bdag gi bu dga' ba spyod pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag lha bzang zhes bya bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407b-6: 'di'ang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407b-7: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blta na bzang zhes bya bar gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407b-19: 'chad na 'og gi chu'i phung po nas sa'i phyogs de'i bar gyi rdul de thams cad sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur par blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:407b-21: chos 'di dag nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-0: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom @408a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-1: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la rgyun ma chad cing las gzhan mi byed par nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 'bul ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-2: gang gis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i le'u the tshom thams cad gcod par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-3: 'gyod pa thams cad sel bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-4: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-5: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-12: chung du na dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir glegs bam du bris te 'chang na 'di ni de bas shin tu bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-15: bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du tshul khrims srung zhing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-16: chog shes pa thams cad la dga' bar 'gyur ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-17: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu mos par byed na 'di ni de bas bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-20: bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du bzod pas sgrub cing sems can thams cad kyi ngan du smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408a-21: rdeg par byed pa bzod pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-0: @408b gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos la bzod pa de ni bzod pa de bas bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mchog tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-3: bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du sems can thams cad la nyon mi mongs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-5: srog la mi lta bar bsnyen bkur byed pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-6: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches shing the tshom mi skyed na brtson 'grus 'di ni de bas khyad du zhugs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-9: bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-11: mnyam par bzhag pa la gnas pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-12: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rtog cing sems ma zhum pa 'di ni de bas khyad du zhugs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-15: bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du shes rab kyis rtog cing de'i tshul gyi rtog pa dang ldan par gyur pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-16: gang gis shin tu dben pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-17: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nyan par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-23: gzhan la rgya cher ston par byed na de bas 'di nyid bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:408b-24: myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur bar yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-3: bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-5: bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-6: gang du spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-7: de dag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-10: de'i phyir khyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-11: gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-12: de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-14: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la mngon par gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gis gang bar byas te ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing 'di skad kyang smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-17: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yun ring du dzambu'i gling du gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-19: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i chos kyi sgron me yun ring du 'bar bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-20: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang yun ring du gnas par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-21: de la gnas nas 'di lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409a-23: bdag cag gis ni sha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-0: khrag @409b gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sman yon thogs par mi nus na mchod pa gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-1: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu mchi ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-2: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag la'ang sha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-3: khrag gis kyang sman yon mi thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 'tshal ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-6: rigs kyi bu mos de dag nyid la blta bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'tshal bas de dag nyid la mchod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-8: bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-9: rigs kyi bu mos de dag la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-12: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang mchod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-14: bdag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'khod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:409b-15: bdag bdag gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar de dag thams cad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar blangs pa bzhin du rgya cher bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-0: der yang sems can dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges @410a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-4: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-5: 'gro ba mang po la bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-6: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-8: mi rnams kyi don gyi phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-10: bde ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-14: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-15: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-17: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las kyang blangs lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-18: da'ang bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-20: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs bzhin du'ang rgyas par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-22: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bdag dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar zhing theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410a-23: rigs kyi bu mo dag la bstabs par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-0: phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na @410b chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba de ni nges par byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs lags par rtogs par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-1: bdud sdig can dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu mi gda' bar bgyi ba'i slad du brtul du lags kyis kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-3: bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-4: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-7: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i le'u the tshom thams cad gcod par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-8: 'gyod pa thams cad sel bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-9: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sbyong bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-10: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-13: de ltar khyod gang gi tshe na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-14: lha ma yin gyi g-yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-16: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsams na lha rnams ni rgyal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-17: lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur bar re bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-18: koo shi ka khyod la bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-19: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:410b-25: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de na phyir rgol ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-1: klan ka tshol zhing glags lta ba las glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-4: rgyal po'i pho brang du song yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-5: rkun po'i nang du song yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-6: gtum po'i nang du song yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-7: dgra'i nang du song yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-8: phyir rgol ba'i nang du song yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-12: chu'i nang dud song yang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-13: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsam par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-14: de ltar byas na klan ka tshol ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa; dga' bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-16: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-23: rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod las thos nas the tshom thams cad gcod par gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-24: de dag gi nem nur thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-25: 'gyod pa thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-27: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas glags par bya mi nus par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-28: gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nges par mnyan par bya ba de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411a-31: 'di ni ma 'dres pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-0: 'di thos ma @411b thag tu the tshom thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-3: gang mtshams med pa byed pas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'jug cing mos par byed na las de'i las kyi sgrib pa yod par nga mi smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-6: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bdag mngon sum du mchi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-7: gang gi tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab tu zas 'tshal cing mtshams ma mchis pa'i mnyam pa nyid bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na rgyal po ma skyes dgras mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob cing de'i 'gyod pa byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-10: mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa thams cad kyi chos nyid ni gang rgyal po ma skyes dgras rtogs pa de nyid lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-12: byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo dag ni de ltar chos rang bzhin gyis zhi ba la bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-13: bdag gir rnam par brtags nas lta ba 'byung bar bgyid cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-14: ci ltar rgyal po ma skyes dgras rtogs pa bzhin du mtshams med pa bgyid pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin de 'dra ba lags par ni ma 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:411b-15: phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-1: mchis pa la yongs su rtogs pas btags pa rnams ni ma mchis bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-2: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-3: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du sdug bsngal bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-5: bdag ni gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa de dag la ltung ba ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-6: ltung ba'i chos can ma lags so snyam bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-12: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ci nas kyang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412a-17: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i 'od de lta bu g-yas phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin @412b gyis brlabs so zhes de skad kyi sgra byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-1: gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ni gal te rgya mtsho mchid rnam chen po'i nang du mchis par gyur kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-2: sreg pa'i bskal pa'i nang du mchis kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-3: sems can de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-7: ji ltar sgra byung ba bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-8: skyes bu dam pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag gi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe la spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-11: mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-12: srog chags 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-13: byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gsum ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-14: srog chags brgyad stong gis ni 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-15: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:412b-16: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-0: sil snyan brgya stong dkrol bar byed cing @413a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-1: gang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las ni mu stegs can gzhan klan ka la spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-3: bdud kyi yul la gnas pa thams cad tshar bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-4: yang dag pa'i chos la mos pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-5: rigs kyi bu mo dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyag rgya 'di bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-6: gang dag gis phyag rgya 'di shes pa de dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro zhes de skad kyang smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-7: bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad bka' stsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-8: rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-9: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-13: moonggal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-17: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-18: rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-016:413a-20: ratna rakshi tras zhus chen bgyis //
